sentence.Network_en: They were purchased from among men and offered firstfruits to God and the Lamb.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们是从人间买来的、作初熟的果子归与神和羔羊.

sentence.Network_en: Then he struck down all the firstborn in their land , the firstfruits of all their manhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 36他又击杀他们国内一切的长子,就是他们强壮时头生的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: firstborn 初生的firstfruits 初次成果-
they were purchased from among men and offered firstfruits to God and the Lamb .他们是从人间买来的、作初熟的果子归与神和羔羊。
firstfruits的中文意思:初结果...,点击查查权威在线词典详细解释firstfruits的中文翻译,firstfruits的真人发音,用法和例句等。
农作物收获的情况:好收成|今年灾害频繁,收成不好。 中译英: 收成 harvest 平均收成 average cropn.初次成果;第一次收成 firstfruits.

list.abs: honour the LORD with thy substance , and with the firstfruits of all thine increase : … So shall thy barns be filled with plenty , and thy presses shall burst out with new wine .你要以财物，和一切初熟的土产，尊荣耶和华。这样，你的仓房，必充满有余，你的酒榨，有新酒盈溢。
草根书室与光触媒(firstfruits publications)联合呈献: 11月25日, 集体诗踪 (totallylost):鱼店
